author: lightclient
content: FYI, I've made some significant changes to EIP-2733 based on our discussion in the last breakout room. The main changes are i) added a "type" field which can be used to allow for future upgrades (maybe even the upper ~4 bits as a flag), ii) an "extra" field which is defined to be empty initially empty, but may be used for future features, iii) "max_gas_price" instead of "gas_price" to improve the bundling UX, and iv) added a brief discussion on how such a tx can be validated (and monitored) efficiently, under security considerations: https://eips.ethereum.org/EIPS/eip-2733
